# [Interview #988: West Jordan Signing Report - Josh & Mi'ch, Entry #19](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=988#19)

#### Question

The next question I have is does Odium have to recover after Shattering a Shard?

#### Brandon Sanderson

It is a difficult process that is very taxing.
